A data transfer object representing tag information in API responses, used for device categorization and organization within the system.

## Key Components

- **TagResponse**: Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getter/setter generation
- **Fields**:
  - `id`: Unique tag identifier
  - `name`: Human-readable tag name
  - `description`: Detailed tag description
  - `color`: Visual color representation (hex format)
  - `organizationId`: Associated organization
  - `createdAt`/`createdBy`: Audit trail information
- **Swagger Annotations**: Complete OpenAPI documentation with examples

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a tag response
TagResponse tag = TagResponse.builder()
    .id("tag-123")
    .name("production")
    .description("Production environment servers")
    .color("#FF5733")
    .organizationId("org-456")
    .createdAt(Instant.now())
    .createdBy("user-789")
    .build();

// In a REST controller
@GetMapping("/tags/{id}")
public TagResponse getTag(@PathVariable String id) {
    return tagService.getTagById(id);
}
```

The class serves as a standardized response format for tag-related API endpoints, ensuring consistent data structure across the application.
